citation.title: Evidence for Holocene Marine Transgression and Shoreline Progradation Due to Barrier Development in Iskele, Bay of Izmir, Turkey

facebook.title: Evidence for Holocene Marine Transgression and Shoreline Progradation Due to Barrier Development in Iskele, Bay of Izmir, Turkey
facebook.summary:
This paper documents marine transgressions in Turkey with a high stand at 6000 ybp about the same time as the nipissing marine transgession Noble documents in North America😋

facebook.title: Journal of Coastal Research - ():1269 - PDF | Journal of Coastal Research
facebook.summary:
Nipissing marine successive transgression phases documented in Mediterranean Sea of Turkey reaching highstand about 4000 BC and declining forming successive strandlines (beaches) ending in 400 BC,  mirroring that if the Great Lakes basin in America🎉🎉🎉🌀
